messages.subject: Looking for evening playdates in Santa Monica CA area
messages.msgSnippet: Our ds goes to bed around midnight and is aching to play w/ other kids in the evening (maybe 8-10 pm).  He s 4.  He s a sweet, social guy into all things
messages.messageBody:
Our ds goes to bed around midnight and is aching to play w/ other kids in
the evening (maybe 8-10 pm). He's 4. He's a sweet, social guy into all
things mobile. Also drawing and building and running around. Sound
familiar? Are there any kids who stay up late who live in the area who
might like to have evening play dates? This has been the hardest thing to
find for us. I hope hope hope we can find someone out there.

You can email me privately if you'd like at abzb@...

Thanks,

Alison
